files.README.md:
# Gravity Rail Claude Code Plugins

Claude Code plugins for developers building on [Gravity Rail](https://gravityrail.com) — the AI-native operating system for organizations that communicate with people at scale.

## Install

```
/plugin marketplace add Gravity-Rail/claude-plugins
/plugin install gravity-rail-developer@gravity-rail-public-marketplace
```

## What's Included

### gravity-rail-developer

Two skills for working with the published npm packages:

- **`/gr-sdk-guide`** — SDK integration guide: authentication, method conventions, types, Zod schemas, scopes, error handling, and common integration patterns
- **`/gr-cli-guide`** — CLI usage guide: installation, command patterns, domain listing, CRUD recipes, output formats, and scripting tips

## Packages

| Package | npm |
|---|---|
| `@gravity-rail/sdk` | [![npm](https://img.shields.io/npm/v/@gravity-rail/sdk)](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@gravity-rail/sdk) |
| `@gravity-rail/cli` | [![npm](https://img.shields.io/npm/v/@gravity-rail/cli)](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@gravity-rail/cli) |

## License

MIT
